SENT.plain: A rare abnormality of the vertebral artery is described in a 63-year-old male
The right vertebral artery consisted of several minute endothelial lined channels which failed to perfuse at autopsy
The anterior spinal artery showed areas of muscular media dysplasia
These anomalies were associated with large posterior communicating arteries
The terminal event was precipitated by thrombotic occlusion of the left vertebral artery
The embryological aspect of these anomalies are discussed
